'''Blank Dynamic Card''' is an item used to get Dynamic Skins of Character Cards in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==How to Obtain==
Blank Dynamic Cards can be obtained through the [[TCG Player's Manual]] or as [[Player Level]] rewards. A total of 5 Blank Dynamic Cards can be found.
*3× from completing the [[TCG Player's Manual]] objectives for First Match, Second Match, and Third Match.
*2× from leveling the [[Player Level]] to Levels 9 and 10.

==Usage==
Using the Blank Dynamic Card in the [[Inventory]] will open the "Exchange Skin" menu, listing the available Character Card Dynamic Skins to purchase.

Contrary to the item's description, you are only able to obtain Character Card Dynamic Skins, and cannot get Dynamic Skins for other types of cards.
